alert.note: Alert for Adams (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Allen, northern Adams, southwestern Paulding and northwestern Van Wert Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 110 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Monroe, or near Decatur, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Decatur around 120 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Monroeville and Convoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
